verses.verse: And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood: <S%H6086><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof; it was foursquare; <S%H7251><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof on <S%H5921><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> of it; the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof were <S%H1961><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same: and he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with brass. <S%H5178><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> <S%H853><s%> the pots, <S%H5518><s%> and the shovels, <S%H3257><s%> and the basins, <S%H4219><s%> and <S%H853><s%> the fleshhooks, <S%H4207><s%> and the firepans: <S%H4289><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof made <S%H6213><s%> he of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> for the altar <S%H4196><s%> a brazen <S%H5178><s%> grate <S%H4345><s%> of network <S%H4639><s%> <S%H7568><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the compass <S%H3749><s%> thereof beneath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4295><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the midst <S%H2677><s%> of it.

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> for the four <S%H702><s%> ends <S%H7099><s%> of the grate <S%H4345><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> to be places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves. <S%H905><s%>
And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with brass. <S%H5178><s%>

And he put <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it withal; he made <S%H6213><s%> the altar hollow <S%H5014><s%> with boards. <S%H3871><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and the foot <S%H3653><s%> of it of brass, <S%H5178><s%> of the looking glasses <S%H4759><s%> of the women assembling, <S%H6633><s%> which <S%H834><s%> assembled <S%H6633><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the court: <S%H2691><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%> the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> were of fine twined linen, <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%>

Their pillars <S%H5982><s%> were twenty, <S%H6242><s%> and their brazen <S%H5178><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> twenty; <S%H6242><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> were of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And for the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> the hangings were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> were twenty, <S%H6242><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> twenty; <S%H6242><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And for the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> were hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> ten, <S%H6235><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> ten; <S%H6235><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>
And for the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

The hangings <S%H7050><s%> of <S%H413><s%> the one side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate were fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three, <S%H7969><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

And for the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> on this hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and that hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> were hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three, <S%H7969><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> were of fine twined linen. <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%>

And the sockets <S%H134><s%> for the pillars <S%H5982><s%> were of brass; <S%H5178><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> and the overlaying <S%H6826><s%> of their chapiters <S%H7218><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> were filleted <S%H2836><s%> with silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> was needlework, <S%H4639><s%> <S%H7551><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined linen: <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length, <S%H753><s%> and the height <S%H6967><s%> in the breadth <S%H7341><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> answerable to <S%H5980><s%> the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court. <S%H2691><s%>

And their pillars <S%H5982><s%> were four, <S%H702><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> four; <S%H702><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and the overlaying <S%H6826><s%> of their chapiters <S%H7218><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> were of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

This <S%H428><s%> is the sum <S%H6485><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> even of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of testimony, <S%H5715><s%> as <S%H834><s%> it was counted, <S%H6485><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

And Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And with <S%H854><s%> him was Aholiab, <S%H171><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach, <S%H294><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> an engraver, <S%H2796><s%> and a cunning workman, <S%H2803><s%> and an embroiderer <S%H7551><s%> in blue, <S%H8504><s%> and in purple, <S%H713><s%> and in scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine linen. <S%H8336><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> that was occupied <S%H6213><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, even the gold <S%H2091><s%> of the offering, <S%H8573><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> talents, <S%H3603><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

And the silver <S%H3701><s%> of them that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was a hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents, <S%H3603><s%> and a thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and threescore and fifteen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H2568><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%>

A bekah <S%H1235><s%> for every man, <S%H1538><s%> that is, half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> for every one <S%H3605><s%> that went <S%H5674><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> be numbered, <S%H6485><s%> from twenty years old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> for six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men.

And of the hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> cast <S%H3332><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the veil; <S%H6532><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of the hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents, <S%H3603><s%> a talent <S%H3603><s%> for a socket. <S%H134><s%>

And of the thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> shekels he made <S%H6213><s%> hooks <S%H2053><s%> for the pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> their chapiters, <S%H7218><s%> and filleted <S%H2836><s%> them.

And the brass <S%H5178><s%> of the offering <S%H8573><s%> was seventy <S%H7657><s%> talents, <S%H3603><s%> and two thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels. <S%H8255><s%>

And therewith he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sockets <S%H134><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and the brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> and the brazen <S%H5178><s%> grate <S%H4345><s%> for it, and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%>

And the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> and the sockets <S%H134><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>
